p: Attention was also paid to antiviral β-amino acid ester phosphodiamide derivatives, the formula of which is presented below (Compound 10). Their pharmaceutically acceptable salts are useful for the inhibition of ΗΓν reverse transcriptase. They may also be useful for the prevention or treatment of ΗΓν infection, as well as prevention, treatment and delaying the onset or progression of AIDS [ 35].
